circumstances: Approaching Anadyr in marginal weather conditions, while cruising at an altitude of 80-100 metres, the pilot initiated a turn when the airplane lost speed, stalled and crashed in a snow covered field located 25 km from Anadyr. The airplane was destroyed and both crew members were killed.
probable_cause: Failure of the pilot to maintain a sufficient speed while performing a turn at a relative low height, causing the airplane to stall.
